name: Spring Vegetable and Hummus Tostadas
description: I love to use hummus on a tostada because it doesn't require any heating up.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the tops off of the asparagus and cut the stems into ¼ inch rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the tops off of the asparagus and cut the stems into ¼ inch rounds.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large bowl with ice and water.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a large bowl with ice and water.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the asparagus into the boiling water for 3 min. Remove with a strainer into the bowl with icy water. Once the asparagus is cold remove from ice water and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the asparagus into the boiling water for 3 min. Remove with a strainer into the bowl with icy water. Once the asparagus is cold remove from ice water and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Refill ice bowl and drop the peas into the boiling water and immediately take them out with a strainer into the icy water. Once the peas are cold, remove from ice water and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Refill ice bowl and drop the peas into the boiling water and immediately take them out with a strainer into the icy water. Once the peas are cold, remove from ice water and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Refill ice bowl, and drop the fava beans into the boiling water for 2 min. Remove with a strainer into the bowl with the icy water. Once the fava beans cool down remove from ice water and peel to remove the whitish skin covering them.
recipeInstructions.name: Refill ice bowl, and drop the fava beans into the boiling water for 2 min. Remove with a strainer into the bowl with the icy water. Once the fava beans cool down remove from ice water and peel to remove the whitish skin covering them.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large sauté pan over medium-heat, add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and sauté, stirring for 1 minute. Add all of the vegetables until they are coated with the oil and are warm.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large sauté pan over medium-heat, add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and sauté, stirring for 1 minute. Add all of the vegetables until they are coated with the oil and are warm.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lemon zest and mint and stir. Remove from the heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the lemon zest and mint and stir. Remove from the heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread 2 tbsp. of hummus on each tostada and top with a generous amount of spring vegetables. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread 2 tbsp. of hummus on each tostada and top with a generous amount of spring vegetables. Serve immediately.
